description: Rangers: 'We're chuffed to pieces' - Ross McCausland
title: Rangers: 'We're chuffed to pieces'
title_page: Rangers: 'We're chuffed to pieces' - Ross McCausland - BBC Sport
maintext:
Rangers winger Ross McCausland says it means "more than anything" to qualify for the last 16 of the Europa League automatically.
"We're absolutely delighted," he told BBC Scotland. "When the draw first came out, people probably doubted us getting to this situation. So now we're in this situation and we're chuffed to pieces.
"It shows the quality we have within our squad and how good we are.
"It means more than anything. It's something we wanted to do going into the game. We just wanted to win and that was what we've done. Now we've put ourselves in a very good situation."
When asked if he believes Rangers can go all the way to the final like they did in 2022, he said: "Yeah. Definitely. 100%."
